statements: UPDATE website_traffic SET engagement_score = 7.5 WHERE website_id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic SET visit_timestamp = '2021-08-25 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE website_traffic SET engagement_score = 8.5, visit_timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE website_id = 123 AND user_id = 456
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_url = '/about-us', engagement_score = 7.2 WHERE website_id = 789
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_views = 1000, unique_visitors = 500 WHERE website_id = 1;
UPDATE user_engagement SET conversions = 50, session_duration = 25.5 WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_views = 1000, unique_visitors = 500, time_on_page = 3.5 WHERE website_id = 1;
UPDATE user_engagement SET session_duration = 25.75, conversions = 10, clicks = 200 WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE website_traffic SET time_spent_seconds = 120 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_engagement SET engagement_score = 8.7, last_activity_timestamp = '2021-09-15' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE website_traffic SET time_spent_seconds = 120 WHERE user_id = 100 AND page_url = 'https://example.com/page1'
UPDATE business_intelligence SET report_content = 'Quarterly financial report' WHERE report_id = 10 AND user_id = 200
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_url = 'www.example.com', referral_source = 'Google' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_engagement SET engagement_time = '1 hour', click_count = 5 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE website_traffic SET referral_source = 'Social Media' WHERE user_id = 101 AND visit_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE performance_analysis SET engagement_rate = 8.75, bounce_rate = 15.23 WHERE page_url = '/products/123';
UPDATE website_traffic SET visit_duration = 60 WHERE id = 1234;
UPDATE website_metrics SET average_visit_duration = 70, total_page_views = 1500 WHERE page_url = 'example.com';
UPDATE website_traffic SET visit_duration = 120 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE user_engagement SET duration_seconds = 45, interaction_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 20;
